sense.def:
Business
je delo, povezano s izdelovanjem, kupovanjem in prodajo blaga ali storitev.

seg.quote: There are good profits to be made in the hotel business.
Are you in San Francisco for business or pleasure?

sense.def:
A business
je organizacija, ki izdeluje in prodaja blago ali ponuja usluge.

seg.quote: He set up a small travel business.

sense.def:
Kadar trgovina ali podjetje
goes out of business
, neha poslovati, ker ne zasluži dovolj denarja.

Z besedo
business
lahko opišemo kakršnokoli dejavnost, položaj ali vrsto dogodkov.

seg.quote: She got on with the business of clearing up.
The whole business affected him profoundly.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
one's business
, zadeva samo tistega človeka osebno in se v tisto drugi ne bi smeli vmešavati.

seg.quote: That's his business and no one else's.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
has no business to do something
, nima pravice tistega početi.

seg.quote: She had no business to publish his letters.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
mind your own business
ali
it's none of your business
, sogovorniku povemo, naj ne sprašuje po nečem, kar ga nič ne zadeva;

cit.quote: Zase se brigaj! Te nič ne briga!
